file_content.text: There, sir! Just as I said.
That looks like her, all right.
That looks like him, all right.
Bounty hunter, I am Sergeant Wallax of the Imperial Navy. You are commanded to hand over all of your weapons and gear immediately.
Am I under arrest, Sergeant?
I do something wrong?
Just stay calm and hand over your weapons.
How about I just hand over the ammo, instead?
You don't need my weapons.
You're a funny man, Sergeant. Think of that joke all by yourself?
Ha! That'll be the day.
Don't get cute, offworld scum.
You're lucky to be breathing the same air as me, alien. Don't push your luck.
Remember, you're an outsider here. I can shoot you just as easily as bring you in.
Sergeant, Tarro Blood here. Have you completed my little errand yet?
Blood! You steaming pile of filth!
Blast it! I told you not to call on this channel!
Everyone who doesn't want to die, leave now.
Walk away or else.
Getting others to do your dirty work? That's just low.
You're pathetic, Blood.
Since when does the Imperial Navy take its orders from Mandalorians?
Now this is interesting.
Oh, this is ridiculously tiresome.
She's still alive? What is wrong with you, Sergeant?
He's still alive? What is wrong with you, Sergeant?
Uh, sir? Who is that guy?
He's nobody! Don't get distracted, men. We have a dangerous fugitive to apprehend.
I'm here as part of the Great Hunt.
I'm no fugitive.
That is a lie! You haven't even qualified yet!
Think we can take these guys, Mako?
What do you say, Mako?
Easily.
Don't be stupid.
Blood, I'll talk to you later. Ignore the chatter, men. Let's take this hunter in.
I don't know what's going on here, Sarge, but I know it stinks.
Yeah. Either you cut us in on this deal, or we walk.
You really don't want to mess with me.
You're making a mistake.
I'll give you a cut, you miserable, greedy thugs. Now attack!
You can't spend credits if you're all dead.
It's not worth it.
That makes a whole lot of sense. Let's get out of here.
I'm with you.
Cowards! The rest of you, attack!
This is ridiculous. [Attack]
Come and get me, Imperial.
Take your best shot. [Attack]
Defend yourselves, men!
